scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge 'cypress/results/*.json' > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.delete:reports: del cypress\results\* /f /q && del mochawesome-report\* /f /q && del mochawesome-report\assets\* /f /q || true
scripts.cypress:e2e: npm run prereport && npm run cypress:run && npm run junit:merge && npm run mochawesome:merge
